title: The old HUD dies with the new patch

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Candyblock,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=fcsiEaP4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-08-05T02:58:14.433+0000)
>
> you'll get over it

No we won't I play 1 game every morning or night just so I can slowly stop then I started playing Dota2.
RIP Old HUD, simple and effective.

I'm going to feel a little bit of emptiness in my chest now.. its just like something's missing.. right next to giant gaping emptiness that I felt after the old TT was done away with. rip tt, lest we forget {{item:3070}}
